channel.description:
[center][CENTER][b][AbaddonScape][/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/aMvg4xH.png[/img]
https://www.dropbox.com/s/06mozdyv5886me5/Abaddon.jar?dl=1 <-- [b]RELEASE[/b]
[Some cool features] - Kraken boss - NMZ - Drop party @ 10 players - All skills work 100% - Awesome PK area's - Friendly community & staff - Donator zones - Working fight caves - Awesome content for everyone to enjoy!
[Welcome to AbaddonScape!]

item.title: OS Abaddon - #1 OS Based Pk/Pvm
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If you’re the owner, that’s must mean you have two accounts. “AbaddonScape”, and “Promoted”. How can this be? Either “AbaddonScape” is the owner of this server, thus disallowing you to make a post here for the same server; OR, “Promoted” is the owner of the server, in which case, the previous poster of this server “AbaddonScape” was not the owner, and thus deserved the lock it received.

In either case, it doesn’t matter, because I can see you’re both posting from the same IP, minutes apart. So as of now, you’re both banned from posting in this section.

Read full topic

item.title: OS Abaddon - #1 OS Based Pk/Pvm
item.dc:creator: @Promoted Promoted
item.description:
@Promoted wrote:

Eh i dont really care about the haters but its Tyreatta but way different than the original Source n client… fixed alot of dupes i put alot of shit into it… still yet everybody hates wich doesnt really bother me i added alot more more shops more area’s more bosses more items warriors guild nightmare zone just because you can see stuff from tyreatta doesnt mean i didnt add shit to it…?

Read full topic

item.title: OS Abaddon - #1 OS Based Pk/Pvm
item.dc:creator: @arean1 arean1
item.description:
@arean1 wrote:

Hahahahaha, I love his dedication though to keep going despite all the haters. But seriously, you should work on this before you officially release this because what I see right now is a leeched server with an owner that did nothing but do “ctrl + f” and change “tyrettascape” to “abaddonscape”. Personally I can’t see this succeeding as it is exactly the same as every other server known to man. However, I hope you learn from your mistakes my son.

Read full topic
